item.title: Can someone plz help me change my server to a pvp server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Replace all of that with this.

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3043 && absX <= 3122 && absY >= 3523 && absY <=3449 || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3499) && (coordY <= 3488) && (coordX <= 3091) && (coordX >= 3098)) { return true;

item.source: Can someone plz help me change my server to a pvp server

item.title: Can someone plz help me change my server to a pvp server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay,

  1. open up your client.java
  2. Search for:
public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

Then you should see something sort of resembling this:

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3356 && absY >= 3244 && absY <=3257) {
3. Replace the

if (Type == 1) {

with this:

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3521) && (coordY <= 3449) && (coordX <= 3043) && (coordX >= 3122) ||

But, make sure not to overwrite the other few coordinates, or it could have undesirable consequences.

Read full topic
